objenome.solver.evolve

Class BranchedBreeder

  • java.lang.Object
    • objenome.solver.evolve.BranchedBreeder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Breeder, Listener<ConfigEvent>, PopulationProcess

    public class BranchedBreeder
extends java.lang.Object
implements Breeder, Listener<ConfigEvent>
    A BranchedBreeder produces a new Population by applying a single genetic operator per individual. The operator that is applied at each step is selected at random. The designated IndividualSelector is used to choose the individuals that undergo the selected operator. The result is that each individual in the new population that is produced is the product of just one genetic operator.

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public Population process(Population population)
        Applies genetic operators to produce a new population. The available operators are repeatedly selected from at random and applied to produce new individuals that are added to the next population. The configured IndividualSelector is used to select individuals from the existing population to supply as inputs to the operator. The number of individuals required by the operator is determined by its inputSize method. The individuals returned by an operator are inserted into the next population. This process is repeated until the next population has been filled. If the new population has insufficient space for all the new individuals then only those that there is space for will be added and all others will be discarded.
        Specified by:
        process in interface PopulationProcess
        Parameters:
        population - the current population of individuals that a new population will be produced from
        Returns:
        a newly constructed population filled with individuals produced by the application of genetic operators

      • update

        public void update(Population population,
                   int num)

      • setup

        protected void setup(GPContainer config)
        Sets up this breeder with the appropriate configuration settings. This method is called whenever a ConfigEvent occurs for a change in any of the following configuration parameters:
        • Breeder.OPERATORS
        • Breeder.SELECTOR
        • RandomSequence.RANDOM_SEQUENCE
        • BranchedBreeder.ELITISM

      • onEvent

        public void onEvent(ConfigEvent event)
        Receives configuration events and triggers this breeder to configure its parameters if the ConfigEvent is for one of its required parameters.
        Specified by:
        onEvent in interface Listener<ConfigEvent>
        Parameters:
        event - the fired event object.
